name: Auto Age: Standoff (Sunset Edition)
description:
In the bright but distant future, the recovery of New America rests in the hands of wheeled warriors. 

Auto Age: Standoff (Sunset Edition) is the Itch.io version of the 2017 Steam release Auto Age: Standoff. The Steam version of the game is effectively delisted at this point.

The Sunset Edition disables all Steam connectivity and strips out the previous online multiplayer functionality. It's still possible to play online, but it's not a very convenient setup. LAN functionality has been added.

The Sunset Edition is offered as "pay what you want" and will not likely be further improved or developed. Play at your own risk.

In a high-tech world of lowlifes, you'll need every advantage you can get. Choose your chassis and gear up with powerful weaponry and the latest gadgets, including missile launchers, ramming plates, mines, repair stations, and more.

  • 20+ vehicles including light, medium, heavy and tower classes
  • 30+ weapons and gadgets to use in customization

Seven maps, five modes, and a super-short-story tutorial.

Single and local multiplayer (split screen and LAN support).

  • Deathmatch: free-for-all and team-based. The classic killfest you know and love.
  • Point Capture: team. Capture and control the point to win.
  • Cube Command: free-for-all and team-based. Carry the cube to gain points.
  • Horde: up to 4-player co-op. How many waves of enemies can you beat? 
  • Elimination: free-for-all and team-based. One life. Live it wisely. 
  • Tutorial: Short single player story-based lesson on the basics of play. There is no campaign mode in this game.
